name: AGENTE
description:
AGENTE is a full-stack software development company with extensive experience in UX/UI design for web and mobile applications.
Since 2009, we collaborate closely with startups and established brands to develop digital products from scratch or leverage their existing products.
Our core expertise is:
Web development: React.js, Angular.js, JavaScript, jQuery, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Node.js
Mobile development: Android (Kotlin), iOS (Swift), React Native
UI/UX design
QA & testing
We are here to listen to you and bring your ideas into life. Contact AGENTE at info@agentestudio.comÂ and share your challenge with our team.
